about_the_game:
A New Town, A New Journey:

                                                    Can You Fulfill Her Wildest Desires?

Imagine the excitement and challenges of moving to a new town. You're balancing new classes, making friends, and, most importantly, striving to impress your incredible girlfriend, Jane. But what if you could go beyond her expectations and dive into a world where her deepest desires come true?

                           

Welcome to CuckTales 🐓🌈 —a groundbreaking visual novel that takes you on an emotional and thrilling adventure. Explore the provocative world of Cuckold/Netorase/Netorare/NTR fetishes with a fresh twist, enriched by carefully curated bisexual content. Your choices will shape the narrative, and your courage will define your path to becoming the ultimate boyfriend.

                         

  • Complex Relationship Dynamics 🩷💜: Navigate the intricate and evolving relationship with Jane. Build trust, push boundaries, and experience the raw intensity of love and passion.

  • Breathtaking Visuals 🩷💜: Delight in stunning, hand-drawn artwork that brings each scene and character to vivid life. From tender moments to heart-pounding encounters, every visual is a feast for the eyes.

  • Inclusive and Diverse Content 🩷💜: With specially selected bisexual scenes, CuckTales 🐓🌈 celebrates the diversity of love and desire, offering an inclusive experience for all players.

content_descriptors.notes: Includes vanilla sex , anal , oral ,consensual , bisexual, gay, cheating content.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04.7 or later
  • Processor: 2,0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOs 10.10 or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: CuckTales 🐓🌈

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (x64)
  • Processor: 2,0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
